posts.author: Pan Draconis
posts.content: There was an issue with my PC and NWN EE, so i wasn't able to update my game and to play with better graphics and many mods. But after a long night of trying, I'm able to play Aielund and so on. That's wonderful !

posts.author: Theophilus Fist
posts.content:
Pan Draconis wrote: ↑
May 27, 2023
There was an issue with my PC and NWN EE, so i wasn't able to update my game and to play with better graphics and many mods. But after a long night of trying, I'm able to play Aielund and so on. That's wonderful !
Congrats!
